lead_paragraph: Manager Sam Allardyce has set second from bottom Sunderland a target of five wins from the rest of the season, starting at his former club West Ham United on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Sunderland Wonderland Would Be Five Wins, Says Allardyce
headline.main: Sunderland Wonderland Would Be Five Wins, Says Allardyce

snippet: Manager Sam Allardyce has set second from bottom Sunderland a target of five wins from the rest of the season, starting at his former club West Ham United on Saturday....
